INSERT INTO RESERVATION ( reservation_no, reservation_status, reservation_notes, member_no, department_no, treatment_date, reservation_memo ) VALUES ( #{vo.reservationNo}, '대기', #{vo.notes}, #{memberNo}, #{vo.departmentNo}, TO_DATE(#{vo.treatmentDateString}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT R.reservation_no AS reservationNo, R.treatment_date AS treatmentDateString, R.reservation_status AS reservationStatus, R.reservation_notes AS notes, M.member_name AS name, M.member_phone AS phone, M.member_rrn AS ssn, M.member_email AS email, M.member_address AS address FROM RESERVATION R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.member_no = M.member_no WHERE R.reservation_no = #{reservationNo}
